Home » 39P6 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (6) » 1 Hetuduka, Duka
1.23 Hetuduka, Cittasampayuttaduka
Hetuduka, Duka
Hetuduka, Cittasampayuttaduka
47.
137Hetuṃ cittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
138Hetuyā nava…pe…  avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
139Nahetuṃ cittavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu cittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṃ.)
